text: import java.net.*; public class IPCharacteristics { public static void main(String[]l args) { try { InetAddress address = InetAddress.getByName (args[0]); if (address.isSiteLocalRddress()) System.out.println(address + " is a local network address."); if (address.isLoopbackAddress()) System.out.println(address + " is loopback address."); if (address.isMulticastAddress()) System.out.println(address + " is a multicast address."); else System.out.println(address + " is a unicast address."); } catch (UnknownHostException ex) { System.err.println("Could not resolve " + args[0]); } } } CMPU 3027 Network Programming 34
